info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 11:54PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Luzerne County through 100 AM EDT... At 1153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Biggertown to near Danville to 6 miles northwest of Linglestown. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilkes-Barre, Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Plymouth, Swoyersville, Edwardsville and West Hazleton. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 175. Interstate 476 near 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
